          <title>
            <string language="en">Standing waves from microwaves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Stehen bewegt von den Mikrowellen 
wellenartig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se tenir ondule des micro-ondes</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for observing standing waves using microwaves.</string>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para
